mapper.insert: insert into friend_link(id, name, link, description, avatar, author, email, color, create_time, update_time, status, down_reason) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{link}, #{description}, #{avatar}, #{author}, #{email}, #{color}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{downReason})
mapper.select:
select id, name, link, description, avatar, author, color, create_time, update_time, status, down_reason from friend_link
AND status = #{status} AND author like concat('%', #{author}, '%') AND name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
